sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"记忆，记住，回忆"之意。
means: memorize ： 指有意识的下功夫把某事的整个细节都记在脑子里。
remember ： 含义较广，多指无意识地回忆起往事，也可指通过主观努力去记忆。
recall比remember文雅，指想方设法回忆已经遗忘之事。
recollect ： 指在记忆中搜索，设法想起一时想不起的事情或人，强调过程。
remind ： 指经某人或某事的提醒而回忆起某件已遗忘之事。

sentence.Network_en: I don't try to memorize speeches word for word.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不会试图一字不落地记住讲话要说的内容。

sentence.Network_en: He studied his map, trying to memorize the way to Rose's street.
sentence.Network_cn: 他研究了地图，试图记住到罗丝家那条街的路。

list.abs: ...们用“难以忘怀（never-to-be-forgotten）”来描述一件事情，现在我们只用简短的词“难忘（memorable）”来形容，然后照样忘得一干二净。而在德语里，我们不满足于将事情埋藏着记忆深处，简直是要树立一块纪念碑.
SAT官方指南OG阅读真题10套 - 豆丁网 ... equivocate v. 不清楚 memorable adj. 难忘的更多 pedestrian n. 行人.
（5）可记忆性（Memorability）是指一个不经常登录的用户再来时在不重新学习的情况下，是否还记得如何使用该站点；（6）错误管 …
英语词根表_百度文库 ... mediation 居中调解 memor 记忆,记住的 memory 记忆.
memorize 记住memorizer 存储器memory bank 内存条

entry.def: If you memorize something, you learn it so that you can remember it exactly.

example.ex: He studied his map, trying to memorize the way to Rose's street.
example.tran: 他研究了地图，试图记住到罗丝家那条街的路。

means.word_mean: 1. commit to memory; learn by heart;

sentences.sentence: "Have you memorized your lines for the play yet?"

auth_sentence.content: Repetition is important, she says, to help dyslexic kids memorize visual patterns of words and letters.
auth_sentence.res_content: Repetition is important, she says, to help dyslexic kids memorize visual patterns of words and letters.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Repetition is important, she says, to help dyslexic kids memorize visual patterns of words and letters.

stems_affixes.word_buile: com共同+memor记忆+able……的→大家该一起记住→值得纪念的
im不+memor记忆+ial……的→不能记得的→远古的
memor记忆+andum东西→帮助记的东西→备忘录

stems_affixes.value_cn: 记忆,记忆力;回忆;存储[器]
stems_affixes.word_buile: memor记忆+y状态,性质→n.记忆,记忆力;回忆;存储[器]
re再+membr=memor记忆+ance表名词→n.记得,记忆
com共同+memor记住+ate表动词→大家一起记住→纪念
memor记忆+ize表动词→v.记住,记忆

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使复活,使重新充满活力

tempor时间+ize……化→时间化→拖延时间

sentences.en: He memorized the list of dates.
The boy can memorize the data easily.
sentences.cn: 这男孩能轻松地记住这些数据。

sentences.en: I shall try to memorize all these phrases.
sentences.cn: 我要熟记所有这些词组。

sentences.en: An actor must be able to memorize his lines.

I shall try to memorize all these phrases.
